name: Spirit Smooches
description:
You are the cutest and most cheerful ghost around!

Sadly, everyone else seems to be really grumpy. Maybe a spectral kiss on the cheek will cheer them up!

Programming by Hamish McIntyre.

Art by Philadelphia Hanson-Viney.

---

This game was made in a few weeks for the Haunted House Jam! It was mainly an exercise to learn GameMaker from scratch, and it was a lot of fun!

---

Sorry guys, since I only have a PC, it looks like GameMaker doesn't let me create a Mac version of this game :(

---

This game is free to download, just name a price of $0! I'm just leaving the optional payment thing in case someone feels like donating, but nobody should feel like that have to!
